outline.text: Together with local  community leaders, Congressman Chet Edwards has worked hard in
Congress to  protect local jobs, spur economic growth and new job creation, and improve the
quality of life for those across our district. Since 2006, Chet has had an impact  on over
11,150 jobs in the twelve county region of  TX-17.
Over 2,075 jobs have been created as a direct result of appropriations projects  supported by
community leaders and funded by Chet since 2006. Independent  economic impact research
and business studies have estimated that more than
will be created by  major economic development projects that Chet has supported.Â  Additionally,
